fields.value: Screening of protease, cellulase, amylase and xylanase from the salt-tolerant and thermostable marine Bacillus subtilis strain SR60

files.description: Figure 1. Phylogenetic tree of isolated SR60 and other related species based on 16S rRNA sequences. The scale bar represents 0.01 substitutions per site. GenBank accession numbers of the sequences are given in parentheses.

files.description: Figure 2. Screening of protease in crescent saline molarity. Halos around bacterial colonies are indicative of cellulose degradation.
